description: This file defines an Angular component called IntegrationsComponent, responsible for managing integrations. It provides functionalities to load, select, and connect integrations through an API service, utilizing Angular's dependency injection, component metadata, and reactive programming via observables.

classes.name: IntegrationsComponent
classes.description: Angular component that manages integrations by loading, selecting, and connecting them within the UI.

methods.name: reload
methods.description: Loads the list of integrations from the backend API.

methods.name: select
methods.description: Selects a specific integration for editing or connection.

methods.name: connect
methods.description: Initiates the process to connect or update the selected integration with provided form data.
